Package ohos.media.audio

Class AudioCapturerConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.media.audio.AudioCapturerConfig

  • public final class AudioCapturerConfig
extends Object
    Provides audio capturer configuration.
    Since:
    1
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Multimedia#AUDIO

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      AudioCapturerConfig​()
      Default constructor used to create an AudioCapturerConfig instance.
      AudioCapturerConfig​(int sessionIndex, AudioStreamInfo info, String pkgName, int portId, boolean silenced, AudioCapturerInfo.AudioInputSource inputSource)
      A constructor used to create an AudioCapturerConfig instance based on a specified session ID, audio stream information, application package name, port ID, audio input source, and whether the audio recording is to be silenced.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AudioCapturerConfig

        public AudioCapturerConfig​()
        Default constructor used to create an AudioCapturerConfig instance.
        Since:
        1

      • AudioCapturerConfig

        public AudioCapturerConfig​(int sessionIndex,
                           AudioStreamInfo info,
                           String pkgName,
                           int portId,
                           boolean silenced,
                           AudioCapturerInfo.AudioInputSource inputSource)
        A constructor used to create an AudioCapturerConfig instance based on a specified session ID, audio stream information, application package name, port ID, audio input source, and whether the audio recording is to be silenced.
        Parameters:
        sessionIndex - Indicates the session ID.
        info - Indicates an AudioStreamInfo instance.
        pkgName - Indicates the application package name.
        portId - Indicates the recording port ID.
        silenced - Indicates whether the audio recording will be silenced. Value true means the capturing will be silenced, while false means the opposite.
        inputSource - Indicates the audio input source.
        Since:
        2
